channel.title: Need help.. Plox
channel.description:
hi all,,
i want to know how i make myself owner on a 508 server i know how to make myself admin ... i give my self 2 rights but if i log in with chris... who is the coder of the source i am owner.. so wtf? can some1 help me
ANd a another thing how do i change what npc's say?
